mapper.select: select p.name, p.tour_theme, p.price, a.saved_img, p.post_id, a.loading_img, code_val(p.completion) completion, p.max_reservation from package_regist p JOIN attached_file a ON p.post_id = a.post_id WHERE a.img_type = 'U2'

SELECT 'RIV' || (TO_NUMBER(NVL((SUBSTR(MAX(review_id), 4)), (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '0000'))) + 1) FROM review WHERE SUBSTR(review_id, 4, 6) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')
INSERT INTO review (review_id, writer_id, review_type, origin_post_id, grade, content, write_date) VALUES (#{reviewId}, #{writerId}, 'E1', #{originPostId}, #{grade}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM(SELECT post_id, name, content, tour_theme, deadline_date, start_date, end_date, max_reservation, code_val(completion) completion, writer_id, now_reservation, reg_date FROM package_regist WHERE writer_id = #{pacVO.writerId} AND completion = #{pacVO.completion} ORDER BY reg_date DESC) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{pagingVO.start } AND #{pagingVO.end }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM package_regist r RIGHT JOIN calculation c on r.post_id = c.post_id WHERE r.writer_id = #{writerId} AND c.cal_status = 'V2'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM(SELECT r.post_id, r.name, r.content, r.tour_theme, r.deadline_date, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.max_reservation, code_val(r.completion) completion, r.writer_id, r.now_reservation, r.reg_date FROM package_regist r RIGHT JOIN calculation c on r.post_id = c.post_id WHERE r.writer_id = #{pacVO.writerId} AND c.cal_status = 'V2' ORDER BY reg_date DESC) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{pagingVO.start } AND #{pagingVO.end }
SELECT content, name, price, start_date, end_date, deadline_date, now_reservation, max_reservation, tour_theme, code_val(completion) completion, post_id FROM package_regist WHERE post_id=#{postId}

SELECT p.post_id, p.member_id, p.price, p.order_status, p.quantity, p.order_date, m.member_name, m.nationality, code_val(m.gender) gender, m.birth_date FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN member m on p.member_id = m.member_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}
